CustomField.description: This field is optional. It is a picklist that specifies the type of payment amount. NOTE: This amount, when used in the context of a recharacterization, includes the contribution amount plus earnings attributable.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies the type of payment amount. NOTE: This amount when used in the context of a recharacterization includes the contribution amount plus earnings attributable.
CustomField.label: Payment Amount Type

value.fullName: Portion of balance or contribution amount
value.label: Portion of balance or contribution amount
